platform.game

Class Arrow

  • java.lang.Object
    • platform.game.Actor
      • platform.game.Arrow
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Actor>

    public class Arrow
extends Actor
    Arrow represents an Actor dealing ARROW type damages.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double angle
      Indicates the angle of the arrow when it flies and when it lands
      private Actor owner
      Indicates who shot the arrow
      private Vector position
      Position of the Arrow.
      private Vector relativePosition
      Indicates the relative position of the Arrow (relative to the center of the target)
      private static long serialVersionUID 
      private boolean shot
      Indicates whether the arrow has been shot or not (i.e. is on something)
      private Actor target
      Indicates where the arrow has landed
      private Vector velocity
      Speed of the Arrow.

      • getPriority

        protected int getPriority()
        Description copied from class: Actor
        Classification criteria for all Actors. Has to be defined by each and everyone of them. This method makes this class abstract, so non instantiable.
        Specified by:
        getPriority in class Actor
        Returns:
        an integer used to classify all Actors by importance.
